markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eternal Wings (Aasimar)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1366) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Celestial Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1360)

</column>

---

Your wings are now a permanent part of your body. You gain the effects of [Celestial Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1360) at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
name: Eternal Wings (Aasimar)

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Eternal Wings (Aasimar) Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 36 2.0 Prerequisites Celestial Wings --- Your wings are now a permanent part of your body. You gain the effects of Celestial Wings at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
